lead_paragraph: Abdullah, a safety for the Vikings and the Chiefs, announced his retirement, citing the five concussions he incurred during his seven-year career.
snippet: Abdullah, a safety for the Vikings and the Chiefs, announced his retirement, citing the five concussions he incurred during his seven-year career.
abstract: Former Minnesota Vikings and Kansas City Chiefs safety Husain Abdullah announces he will retire, citing concerns about concussions sustained during his career.
